node.html: A/B Testing, Markowitz Portfolio Theory, Econometrics, Pricing Strategy, Accounting, Valuations, Market Psychology, Options Trading, Project Management, and Presentations.
Command Line, Databricks, Jupyter Notebooks, Git, LaTeX, and Markdown.
Pandas, PySpark, Numpy, Scikit-learn, TS Fresh, spaCy, PyTorch, and Keras.
Tableau, Plotly (weapon of choice), Seaborn, Matplotlib, and ggplot.

Supervised and Unsupervised Learning Algorithms, Natural Language Processing, Bayesian Inference, Cloud Computing, Deep Learning (RNN, LSTM, Attention Based Models, and Autoencoders), Topic Modelling (LDA/LSA/NMF), and Regression Analysis.
